reuters.title: COLEMAN SEES 23 CTS A SHR 1ST QTR CHARGE FROM HEAT EXCHANGER REPLACEMENT PROGRAM
reuters.body: Shr 2.90 dlrs vs 1.44 dlrs Net 8,862,000 vs 4,391,000 Revs 221.6 mln vs 265.3 mln NOTE: Translated from Italian lire in U.S. dollar equivalents at the exchange rate prevailing at Dec 31, 1986. Reuter 
